attributes.action: Urge the Indonesian Goverment to maintain and enforce the protected area status of the Heart Of Borneo, and object to BHP Billitons plans to mine for coal in this area
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent efforts to lobby the Indonesian government by BHP Billiton to revoke protected areas status in the heartland of Borneos Interior threaten an already fragile and diminishing ecosystem. It also threatens the habitat of the orang utangs of Borneo. Please sign the petition to register your disapproval for such activity and to urge the British Government to discuss this issue with Indonesia and BHP Billiton
